SEARCH
Package AdventureModel

Class AdventureObject

java.lang.Object
AdventureModel.AdventureObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class AdventureObject extends Object implements Serializable
This class keeps track of the props or the objects in the game. These objects have a name, description, and location in the game. The player with the objects can pick or drop them as they like and these objects can be used to pass certain passages in the game.
See Also:

    • getLocation

      public Room getLocation()
      This method returns the location of the object if the object is still in the room. If the object has been pickUp up by the player, it returns null.
      Returns:
      returns the location of the object if the objects is still in the room otherwise, returns null.

    • getOnConsume

      public HashMap<String,Integer> getOnConsume()
      This method returns the HashMap describing how the object should affect the player when consumed.
      Returns:
      the HashMap describing how the object should affect the player when consumed.

    • consume

      public void consume(Player player)
      If the object is consumable, this method affects the player based on onConsume property.
      Parameters:
      player - the player which consumes the object
